snippet: A suspected member of an Irish Republican Army splinter group has been arraigned in a Dublin court to face extradition back to Northern Ireland, where he jumped bail while awaiting trial in connection with the IRA killing of a prison guard....

headline.main: Walls, Drones and Mines: Turkey Tightens Border as Syria Incursion Deepens
headline.print_headline: Walls, Drones and Mines: Turkey Tightens Border as Syria Incursion Deepens

lead_paragraph: A suspected member of an Irish Republican Army splinter group has been arraigned in a Dublin court to face extradition back to Northern Ireland, where he jumped bail while awaiting trial in connection with the IRA killing of a prison guard.
